description: Following a four-month residency in Mallorca, Spain, the artist has a new body of work that reflects the light of the Mediterranean.
title: Artist Andrea Marie Breiling On Capturing the Light of Mallorca

description: A study backed by Sam Altman analyzed 1,000 participants as they received monthly cash payments for three years.
title: A Sam Altman-Backed Group Studied Universal Basic Income For 3 Years. Here’s What They Found.

description: Nyen elaborately guides us through the many layers of his country and lets us ruminate with all of them at once, in sound and video, without missing a beat.
title: Now On View: Ho Tzu Nyen’s Poetic Meditations On Time, Tigers and Colonialism

description: "In the end, the metric you have to measure with is going to be money, but there are all these other things that have to happen first," Bibi chef Chet Sharma tells Observer.
title: Chef Chet Sharma on Science, Success and the Best Pizza in London

description: Raven Chacon and Jonathan González's opening projects in the space will be in conversation with the history of the renovated Beaux Arts–style galleries.
title: The American Academy of Arts and Letters Is Debuting a New Arts Program in Washington Heights

description: Whether you need a hydrating facial or deep-tissue massage, here’s where to have a indulge in a day of pampering in Los Angeles.
title: Where to Have a Serene Spa Day in L.A.
